scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Photographs series includes pictures taken by the Resettlement Administration and the Works Project Administration. The photographs contain images of model towns, aerial views of potential sites, and demonstration homes for the Greenbelt Towns project. Also in the series are photographs taken from impoverished rural and urban areas around the nation where emergency relief could be offered by the government. The photographs were originally found within the papers of the Greenbelt Towns project or in the books on other Resettlement Administration projects. The photographs have been arranged according to project.
The photographs series has been digitized. Duplicate photographs were digitized only when the content (front or back) varies from the original).
